title: KHR_audio_emitter Audio Data
description: Audio data objects define where audio data is located and what format the data is in. The data is either accessed via a bufferView or uri. `mimeType` is required when `bufferView` is used.

uri.description: The uri of the audio file.
uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the audio file. Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.

mimeType.description: The audio's MIME type. Required if `bufferView` is defined. Unless specified by another extension, the only supported mimeTypes are `audio/mpeg` and `audio/wav`.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the audio data. Use this instead of the audio source's uri property.
